ActivityList.SERVICE_NAME:
Select a.*, (Select ProjectName
From Project
Where ProjectCode = a.ProjectCode) as ProjectName , d.ActivityName , d.ActivityCode , (Select PhaseName
From ProjectPhase
Where PhaseCode = d.PhaseCode
And PMCode = d.PMCode) as PhaseName , d.PhaseCode , d.ActivitySeq,
DATE_FORMAT(StartDateTime,'%Y.%m.%d') as StartDate,DATE_FORMAT(EndDateTime,'%Y.%m.%d') as EndDate
From Schedule a , ProjectActivity d
Where a.PMCode = ?
And d.PhaseCode = ?
And a.PMActivityCode = d.ActivityCode
And a.PMCode = d.PMCode
Order by d.ActivitySeq
